questions.question: How does Elizabeth act at first when John returns home from the fields?
Why does John get upset with Elizabeth about Mary Warren?

choices.answer: She gave Mary Warren too many chores.
She let Mary Warren go to Salem.
She thinks John was having an affair.

questions.question: Why does Mary Warren have to go to town now?
The people in the jails will hang unless they do what?
How do the girls act in the courtroom now, and who is their leader?
How do John and Elizabeth know the witchcraft accusations are a fraud?

choices.answer: Abigail told Elizabeth it was fraud.
Abigail admitted it to John in Betty's room.

questions.question: Why is John worried about going into Salem to tell what he knows?

choices.answer: Abigail could call him out for lechery.
He could be accused of being a witch.
He fears people would just him for ratting out the girls.
He thinks people won't believe him.

questions.question: Why does Elizabeth think John is hesitant to go to Salem to tell what he knows?

choices.answer: She thinks he still loves Abigail and refuses to hurt her.
She thinks John is simply a coward.
She thinks he has something to hide from the court and her.
She believes he is a liar.

questions.question: What did Mary Warren make for Elizabeth while in the courtroom?
What does Mary Warren accuse Sarah Good of doing while in court and on other  occasions?

choices.answer: Trying to kill her by sending her spirit out on Mary.
Trying to kill her by poking Mary with a needle.
Trying to kill Mary by poisoning her.
Failing to say the Ten Commandments correctly.

questions.question: What is unusual about Sarah Good’s condition?
How did Mary Warren save Elizabeth’s life in the courtroom?

choices.answer: She actually didn't, she accused Elizabeth of witchcraft.
She cried when they wanted to hang Elizabeth.
She said Elizabeth never sent her spirit out to hurt others.

questions.question: Who does Elizabeth believe mentioned her name?
Why does Rev. Hale visit the Proctor house?

choices.answer: To find out why they don't adopt the practices of the church
to find out why they work on Sunday
To find out if John had an affair

questions.question: Why are only 2 of the 3 Proctor children baptized?

choices.answer: The other doesn't believe in God.
They stopped believing in God after 2 kids.
They didn't want Parris to baptize their 3rd child.
Because they were bewildered by the church.

questions.question: Why is it ironic that John forgets the commandment that he does?

choices.answer: It is the one he has most recently disobeyed.
It is the one about keeping God's day holy and they don't.
The minister broke it while asking the questions.

questions.question: When Giles Corey comes to the Proctor house who does he say has been arrested?
Why is Elizabeth arrested and who do we know accused her?

choices.answer: For having a poppet, Abigail Williams
For being a witch, Abigail Williams
For having an affair, Abigail Williams
For having a poppet, Mary Warren
